mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, status, msg, uid, user_name, operate_type, create_time, command from t_electricity_cabinet_physics_oper_record where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, status, msg, uid, user_name, operate_type, create_time, command from t_electricity_cabinet_physics_oper_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_electricity_cabinet_physics_oper_record(electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, status, msg, uid, user_name, operate_type, create_time, command) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{cellNo}, #{status}, #{msg}, #{uid}, #{userName}, #{operateType}, #{createTime}, #{command})
mapper.update:
update t_electricity_cabinet_physics_oper_record
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
status = #{status},
msg = #{msg},
uid = #{uid},
user_name = #{userName},
operate_type = #{operateType},
create_time = #{createTime},
command = #{command},
where id = #{id}
